Have a friend who went through the same thing here, first year of marriage, happy, but by the second year it started spiraling down, and mind you, she made an effort to fix it, unlike her shit husband who wouldn't even fucking talk to her about it. Near the end of their 2nd year of marriage they were barely doing it, and she endured another whole year of being miserable until she finally mustered the courage to divorce that piece of shit and started dating again. Eventually found a guy who actually loves and cherish her and showers her with attention. A year later into their relationship and they get married, and are now happily married for 7 years, with 2 kids and another coming in a few months.
